Package com.vpavlov.console

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
com.vpavlov.console.Logger
public class Logger extends Object
Provides logging to the console and log file
Author:
vpavlov

  • Constructor Details

    • Logger

      public Logger(boolean useDefaultConsole) throws FileNotFoundException
      Default constructor Creates new console and file to log into
      Parameters:
      useDefaultConsole - default console flag. True - use default console, false - use custom console
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if there is error during file creation

    • Logger

      public Logger(File file, LogConsole console) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      file - file to log into
      console - console to log into
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if there is error during file opening

    • Logger

      public Logger(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      file - file to log into
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if there is error during file opening

      { Constructor
      Parameters:

    • logToConsole

      public void logToConsole(String message) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Log to the console
      Parameters:
      message - message to log
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if console is not attached (null)

    • logToConsole

      public void logToConsole(String message, LogType type) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Log to the console with specified logging tag
      Parameters:
      message - message to log
      type - logging tag
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if console is not attached (null)

      Log to the file
      Parameters:
      message - message to log
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if file is not attached (null)

    • logToFile

      public void logToFile(String message, LogType type) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Log to the file with specified logging tag
      Parameters:
      message - message to log
      type - logging tag
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if file is not attached (null)

    • log

      public void log(String message, LogType logType)
      Log message to the console and to the file at the same time (if there are connected)
      If one of the outputs are not connected, then log is carried out only for one
      Parameters:
      message - message to log
      logType - logging tag
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if both outputs are not connected.

    • printToDefaultConsole

      private void printToDefaultConsole(String message, String color)
      Print line without '\n' symbol to the default console with specified color and color reset.
      Parameters:
      message - message to print
      color - color to message print with

    • printlnToDefaultConsole

      private void printlnToDefaultConsole(String message, String color)
      Print line with '\n' symbol to the default console with specified color and color reset.
      Parameters:
      message - message to print
      color - color to message print with

    • logToDefaultConsole

      private void logToDefaultConsole(String message, LogType type)
      Log a message to the default console
      Parameters:
      message - message to log
      type - log tag
